statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value# ORDER BY OpticsTest.OptiscTestDate asc
SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE OpticsTest.OptiscTestDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#
select case when exists( select * from [dbo].[OpticsTest] where ManualId = #ManualId# and OpticsTestId <> #OpticsTestid# ) then 1 else 0 end
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCFinishCheckId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCFinishCheckId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND PCFinishCheckId = #PCFinishCheckId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND PCFinishCheckId = #PCFinishCheckId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCFinishCheckId = #value#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND PCFinishCheckId = #PCFinishCheckId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND PCFinishCheckId = #PCFinishCheckId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE PCFinishCheckId = #value# ORDER BY OpticsTest.OptiscTestDate asc
SELECT * FROM OpticsTest WHERE OpticsTest.OptiscTestDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND PCFinishCheckId = #PCFinishCheckId#
